meanings.definition: A person or machine that batches items together.
meanings.sent1: The batcher combined all the ingredients for the cake.
meanings.sent2: The factory batcher organized the products for packaging.
meanings.sent3: The diligent batcher made sure all the socks were paired up correctly.
meanings.sent4: She was like a batcher, gathering all the scattered puzzle pieces to complete the picture.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous batcher meticulously arranged the books on the shelf by genre.

meanings.definition: A person who prepares or processes batches of goods.
meanings.sent1: The batcher sorted the fruits into different crates for shipping.
meanings.sent2: The bakery batcher measured out the flour and sugar for the bread.
meanings.sent3: The playful batcher pretended the boxes of toys were treasure chests.
meanings.sent4: He was a batcher of flavors, blending spices to create unique dishes.
meanings.sent5: The skilled batcher carefully inspected each item before packaging them for delivery.

meanings.definition: A person who works in a batch processing system.
meanings.sent1: The batcher monitored the progress of the data processing system.
meanings.sent2: The IT batcher ensured that all files were processed efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The curious batcher wondered how the computer could handle so many tasks at once.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a batcher, organizing her thoughts into manageable chunks.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated batcher diligently checked each step of the process to avoid errors.
